name: Keep Up (itch)
description:
Play as a wisp guiding your balloon through a dangerous and shadowy dungeon. Avoid spikes, collect power ups, and light the way in our newest 2D pixel puzzle game! 

Credits:

Edward Cao - Project Lead

Dhruva Guruprasad - Artist

Hunter Chu - Programmer

Jiminy Cao - Designer/Programmer

Stephane Gagnon - Programmer

Jonah Griffin - Programmer 

Mustafa Siddiqi - Designer
